Disability sector appalled by sudden restrictions on support funding: ‘It makes my blood boil’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/disability-sector-appalled-by-sudden-restrictions-on-support-funding-it-makes-my-blood-boil/5XSXAWKARRGXZIJAS3K4XVV2MQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/disability-sector-appalled-by-sudden-restrictions-on-support-funding-it-makes-my-blood-boil/5XSXAWKARRGXZIJAS3K4XVV2MQ/ Isaac DavisonThe changes were announced with no warning and were effective immediately. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Oliver, 7, and his mother Jessica Barnes. Oliver is autistic and non-verbal and the family relies on disability support funding for respite care. Many of their respite options have now be removed under sudden changes made by the ministry, Barnes said.
